# File import
```{r}
library(readr)
Better_Life_Index_2022 <- read_delim("data/Better Life Index 2022.csv", 
+     delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
library(readxl)
Education <- read_excel("data/Education.xls", 
+     sheet = "Data")
library(readxl)
GDP_current_US_ <- read_excel("data/GDP (current US$).xls", 
+     sheet = "Data")
library(readxl)
GovReg_GHG_proxy_2023 <- read_excel("data/GovReg_GHG proxy_2023.xlsx", 
+     sheet = "EEA proxy dataset (plus)")
library(readxl)
Health <- read_excel("data/Health.xls")
library(readxl)
Share_of_energy_from_renewable_sources <- read_excel("data/Share of energy from renewable sources.xlsx", 
+     sheet = "EU27")
```
